channel.title: About Space Station 14 on Space Station 14
channel.description: Recent content in About Space Station 14 on Space Station 14

item.title: Frequently Asked Questions
item.description: Frequently Asked Questions DISCLAIMER This information could be slightly out of date as we update it less frequently. Check this forum thread for the most up-to-date information. Q: Is It Cursed? Nah. Q: Will SS14 ever cost money? No. Q: Are you the original creator of SS13? Yes/No. The original creator of SS13 would be Exadv1 in 2003. Since its open-sourcing in 2006, the community has been the developers of SS13.

item.title: Space Station 14 Videos and Images
item.description: Both the IRC , matrix and OOC chat (in-game) have a relay to the discord, so if you prefer either of those platforms, use them whitout fear of being ignored. (The matrix relay has a huge delay, so take that into account) You can contact us via: Discord Subreddit Emailtelecommunications@spacestation14.io IRCirc.rizon.net#spacebus

item.title: Downloads
item.description: System Requirements Every Platform: Minimum 64-bit CPU & OS Memory: 2GB Ram Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 or greater Storage: 512MB disk space Recommended 64-bit CPU & OS Memory: 4GB Ram Graphics: OpenGL 3.3 or greater Storage: 1GB disk space Windows: VC++ 2015 Redistributable Linux: OpenAL Freetype macOS: High Sierra or greater M1 Macs probably do not work FAQ Is this malware? No.
